The following is an exhaustive list of the software packages I have either built or contributed. You can take a look at my most recent contributions and ongoing open source projects on [my GitHub](https://github.com/gvegayon)

::: {#refs}
:::

```{r}
#| label: fetchit
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
tmp <- tempfile(fileext = ".bib")
file_url <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/gvegayon/resume/refs/heads/master/software.bib"

ans <- download.file(
  url = file_url,
  destfile = tmp
)

stopifnot(ans == 0)

ans <- file.copy(from = tmp, to = "software.bib")
```
